title: Racs Web3 Integration
description: Seamlessly integrate Ethereum, Polygon, and Binance Smart Chain into Unreal Engine. Our robust plugin, unmatched in quality and affordability, ensures efficient blockchain integration with potential compatibility for other EVM-compatible blockchains.
longDescription:
Unprecedented Quality at an Unbeatable Price


Completely Independet from External Dependencies



Presenting our comprehensive plugin, a sophisticated tool meticulously crafted to harmoniously integrate the Unreal Engine with Ethereum, Polygon, and Binance Smart Chain (BSC) blockchains. Designed with versatility in mind, this powerful solution exhibits potential compatibility with a spectrum of EVM-compatible blockchains, opening new avenues for developers seeking to elevate their projects.



Key Features:


Seamless Integration:

Our plugin offers a seamless bridge between the Unreal Engine and leading blockchains, providing developers with a user-friendly interface to incorporate blockchain functionalities effortlessly.


Multi-Blockchain Support:

Dive into a world of possibilities with native support for Ethereum, Polygon, and Binance Smart Chain (BSC). The plugin's architecture is primed for potential integration with other EVM-compatible blockchains, ensuring adaptability to diverse project requirements.


Smart Contract Interaction:

Unlock the power of smart contracts within your Unreal Engine projects.


Conversion Blueprints:

Simplify complex data transformations with purpose-built blueprints within the plugin. Designed to streamline operations, these blueprints enhance efficiency and provide a versatile toolkit for handling various data conversions seamlessly.


In-Engine Transaction Initiations:

Experience a new paradigm in transaction processing within the Unreal Engine. Our plugin enables users to initiate transactions directly from their endpoints, with the entire process of transaction signing and RLP encoding managed internally for enhanced security.


Secure Private Key Management:

Ensuring the security of crypto assets is paramount. Our plugin advocates for the secure storage of private keys, guiding developers to utilize Save Game Objects for private key storage and emphasizing the importance of direct user ownership.


User-Friendly Documentation:

Accessing the full potential of our plugin is made easy with comprehensive and user-friendly documentation. From integration guides to in-depth explanations of functionalities, developers can navigate seamlessly through the documentation for a smooth implementation process.


Ongoing Community Engagement:

At Racs Studio, we prioritize community engagement. We welcome feedback, suggestions, and contributions from our users. As we evolve and enhance the plugin, your insights play a pivotal role in shaping the future of this powerful tool.



Why Choose Our Plugin?



Efficiency:

Execute transactions with ease directly within the engine, minimizing external dependencies and simplifying the development process. Unlike solutions requiring external APIs, our plugin operates autonomously, offering a streamlined transactional workflow entirely within the Unreal Engine environment.


Security:

Entrust the transaction signing and RLP encoding process to our plugin's internal mechanisms, ensuring a secure and reliable execution. Our solution prioritizes data security, eliminating the need for external dependencies that could introduce vulnerabilities. Your transactions remain safeguarded within the confines of the Unreal Engine.


Developer-Friendly:

Access a detailed example within the plugin's demonstration, providing developers with a simplified yet comprehensive guide to leveraging these powerful features. The intuitive design of our plugin, coupled with extensive documentation, ensures a developer-friendly experience. By eliminating the reliance on external APIs, we enhance accessibility and ease of use for developers at every skill level.


Independence from External Dependencies:

One standout feature of our plugin is its complete independence from external APIs or dependencies. Unlike other solutions that require connections to external services, our plugin operates seamlessly within the Unreal Engine environment. Developers can enjoy a self-contained experience, reducing potential points of failure and enhancing the reliability of transactions.


Elevate Your Transactional Workflow:

Integrate our plugin to experience a new paradigm in transaction processing within Unreal Engine. Simplify your development journey, enhance security, and embrace the efficiency of in-engine transaction initiation, all seamlessly orchestrated by our innovative solution.


As you explore the vast capabilities of our plugin, rest assured that it stands as a self-sufficient and secure tool, requiring no external APIs or dependencies. Elevate your transactional workflow with confidence, knowing that our plugin provides a comprehensive and self-contained solution within the Unreal Engine environment.
technicalDetails:
Features: 


  • PrivateKey Generation (ECDSA)
  • Wallet Management
  • Conversion Utilities
  • Byte and String Conversions
  • Hash Generation (Keccak-256)
  • Blockchain Configuration Blueprint
  • RLP Encoding Blueprint
  • Signature Handling Blueprint (EIP-155)
  • String Manipulation Blueprints
  • Transaction Signature Blueprint
  • JSON Conversion Blueprints
  • Asynchronous RPC Calls
  • Balance and Transaction Count Retrieval
  • Raw Transaction Execution


For detailed documentation about all the blueprints and structures, visit here.



Code Modules: 

  •  RacsWeb3Integration 



Number of Blueprints: 29


Number of C++ Classes: 16


Network Replicated: Not applicable


Supported Development Platforms: Windows (tested)


Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows (tested)


Documentation: https://racsstudio.gitbook.io/racs-web-3-integration/


Example Project: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1p1c1dP9vJsx9Ea5bJuDaMiib-z6fd8o7/view?usp=sharing
